name: Black and White Black forest Cake
content: No matter what the occasion is, Blackforest cake always stands out! A spongy base wrapped in melted chocolate, adorned with vanilla frosting top every cake lover's list of taste buds! If any special occasion like birthday or anniversary is on the calendar, order this luscious black forest bonanza cake.
description: No matter what the occasion is, Blackforest cake always stands out! A spongy base wrapped in melted chocolate, adorned with vanilla frosting top every cake lover's list of taste buds! If any special occasion like birthday or anniversary is on the calendar, order this luscious black forest bonanza cake.

reviews.content: Beautiful cake, the cake looks exactly as advertised on the website. It was a gift and I received a photo of the cake from the receiver and also, was told the cake was delicious!. Delivery was also on time.
Cake is delicious and delivered as per instructions. Great!! Thank you bake and Take Team.

name: Exotic Layer Black Forest Cake
content: Are you cakeoholic? The chocolate shavings of this dainty black forest cake make it forgiving for those who are truly cake-obsessed. Dive in the delicious taste of this amazing and classic cake and make every celebration worth celebrating. An evergreen cake suitable for every occasion be it a birthday, anniversary or any house party.

reviews.content: Fresh and tasty. Thanks to BAKE AND TAKE. Delivered in time.regards
it was ordered on time and taste was amazing! thank you

name: Black Forest Cake With Cherries
content: We kept this Classic cake untouched and unblemished because we feel it's perfect as it is. Baked with the richness of cocoa and lusciousness of fresh vanilla cream, topped with soft chocolate shavings and fresh cherries, this delicious cake will make you surrender to the zest forces of Sweet Indulgence. Savour the original taste of the all time classic- The Black Forest.

Savour the original taste of the all time classic- The Black Forest.

reviews.content: Delivery is always on time and the cakes are always fresh. B&T will always be my first choice when it comes to cakes. Keep it up! ‚ù§?
Yummy Cake...!!!.

name: Heart Shaped Black Forest Delight
content: A luscious heart-shaped black forest cake that looks no less than a chocolate paradise. Yes, this heart-shaped cake black forest cake has been baked and infused with three layers of mushy and creamy cake. Garnished with yummlicious chocolate flakes on the top and by the sides, this cake is embellished with luscious cherries as well. Enjoy a sweet escape to the chocolatey world by ordering this cake on your every special occasion.

reviews.content: The taste was yummm..thanks so much to deliver such a nice cake, it was as same as that of the picture shown on to your website.
very yum cake

name: Choco Cherry Black Forest Cake
content: Wrap your favourite people with your love and satiate their taste buds on their birthday with these incredibly delicious black forest cake covered with rich cream and choco moulds and cherry on the top. With choco shaving adorning the sides, it turns out a perfect birthday cake to offer.

reviews.content: Beautiful cake withe awesome taste
Super soft super tasty Love Bake & Take!

name: Half Chocolate Half Vanilla Cake
content: A toothsome treat for the sugar lovers who are just passionate about chocolate and relish the mushiness of cake. Made of two layers of impossibly moist chocolate filled with mushy rich cream, this cake carries the enticing aroma of Vanilla and sumptuousness of chocolate. On top of it, the cake is garnished with handcrafted white and brown chocolate. Need I say more?

reviews.content: Nice service, just order and forget. The team would take care of the delivery. No reminders required. Like the experience. Would highly recommend. Thank you!
Very happy with the quality of cake and service. Will come back to you next time for sure

name: Chocolate Marble Cake
content: Here's a delicious treat for all the chocolate and health lovers. Layered with an alluring fresh cream supported by some chocolate chips all around. It is certain that one who eats once craves for more. Order this delicious desert and make any day special.

reviews.content: Super delicious cake as always. Thankyou for making our all the events so special with your yummilicious, fresh and soft cakes.
Delivered as scheduled after a small confusion. Most important the taste was good and my family loved it.

name: Red Velvet Cake With Choco Sticks
content: Fill up on a yummy, creamy, frosted Red Velvet sprinkled cake with an evergreen classic vanilla icing base with not cherry but some much delicious chocolate sticks on top. Caught in the vicious cycle of not being able to quit this taste-savvy treat, don‚Äôt forget to share this piece of goodness with your special ones too.

name: Anniversary Theme Cake
content: let your love bloom with each passing day as you choose to surprise him/her over this hearty caricature vanilla cake. Imitating your confession of love, this cake is sure to make him/her fall in love with you, all over again. Order now and express your love in the sweetest most manner over this drool-worthy cake.

The cake was delivered on time without any damage.The taste of cake was good too. If i have to consider cake in future also, then i will order cake from bakingo itself.

name: Delicious White Forest Glaze Cake
content: The White Forest Glaze cake is ready to be served any time and for any occasion. This cake has a white sponge and white chocolate frosting and will make your mouth water at first sight and smell. The perfect cake for any occasion, this White Forest Glaze cake is covered in a light chocolate glaze and made with rich cream. Each slice will make your mouth water for more.

name: Round Pink Roses Vanilla Cake
content: This toothsome strawberry rose is a divine three-layered dessert filled with rich strawberry cream and crushed strawberries. With roses carved on its contours and strawberry cream icing, why give the same old bouquet to your loved ones when you can be one step ahead with this ambrosial strawberry!

reviews.content: This is the second time I have ordered Pink Roses Vanilla Cake it was delicious and loved by everyone. Thank you.

name: Multi Flavoured Heart Shaped Photo Cake
content: Get something unique and amazing for your beloved partner. This love-shaped multi flavour cake will instantly level up the romantic vibes. This soft and creamy cake has a photo print over it and also decked up with a soothing floral design on the top. Order this delightful cake right away.

name: Little Hearts Filled Cup cakes
content: Relish the euphoric flavours of cupcakes and commemorate each moment with the toothsome delicacies we have brought for you. This is a set of cupcakes adorned with pink cream, sprinkles and little hearts giving major valentine vibes in this season of love. So, order today and satiate your loved one's sweet tooth with it.

reviews.content: Ordered this cake for of my bhabhi's birthday and thank you B&T for making it so special.
Awesome taste and Birthday boy loved the taste and guest also loved it... Thanks for the delicious cake... This my first experience withbake and take and it's really amazing I must say.

name: Cream N Blueberry Cupcakes
content: Get lost in the sweet scrumptiousness of cupcakes to satisfy your sweet hunger pangs. Order from us a set of two freshly-baked cupcakes topped with delicous whipped cream with blueberry puree on it along with the final touch of some colourful sprinkles.

reviews.content: Surprisingly, the cake was delivered within an hour of order..Thanks much
Top notch cake, My family loved the cake. Thank you for making the occasion great.

name: Set Of 6 Chocolate Cupcakes For Dad
content: When it comes to expressing love to parents, we convey it more easily to our mothers than fathers. But, a child's love for his/her dad is no less than that of a mother. Of all the ways you can say I Love You to him; choose to say over these six fondant cupcakes that reads DAD I Love You
